meanings.definition: An additional tax on top of the regular tax.
meanings.sent1: The surtax increased the total amount of tax I had to pay.
meanings.sent2: The government introduced a surtax on luxury goods.
meanings.sent3: Paying the surtax felt like adding extra toppings to an already expensive pizza.
meanings.sent4: The surtax was like a cherry on top of the tax sundae.
meanings.sent5: The surtax was like a surprise fee at the end of a shopping spree.

meanings.definition: To impose an additional tax on something.
meanings.sent1: The government decided to surtax imported goods to protect local businesses.
meanings.sent2: They surtaxed the high-income earners to fund public services.
meanings.sent3: It's like when you surtax your friend with extra chores for borrowing your stuff.
meanings.sent4: The decision to surtax the company's profits hit the shareholders hard.
meanings.sent5: The city council voted to surtax property owners for park maintenance.
